review: I have visited here 3-4 times for my dental problem in the last few years. It provides proper explanation & complete solutions for all type of dental problems.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My Mother was suffering Tooth pain for quite long time and was under medication and treatment from a local doctor however pain wasn't cured. So after checking all the rating We decided to visit Lake Denatal Clinic. but our experience was totally different. After checking everything Doctor suggested to go for Root Canal and crown fixing and that will resolve the problem. Dr Anuj Bhattacharya ensured that 90% of the problem will resolved. After visiting him multiple times he did not resolve my Mother Pain at all. Even he again mentioned he needs to do RCT and Crown fixing for another new 2 teeth. Previously already we spent around 30k and again he has given estimated 20k. He should have clearly mentioned at first after diagnosis what are the possibilities and what may be needs to be done after that. ** ** ******* **** **** *** *** *** ***** ****** ******* *** ******* ** ********* **** **** *** ***** **** ********* *** **** ** ******** ** **** We would have relieved if the pain reduced by 50% also. But Mother condition is exactly same when she visited Dr. Anuj Bhattacharya. As per Doctor he has done the correct treatment but unfortunately the treatment cured anything.
reply_text:
Thanks for your detailed feedback. Actually a patient can chose a Doctor but by virtue of ethics no Doctor can or should pick and choose his patients. If that would not have been the case I would definitely have  not taken up this case considering that she was treated by half a dozen  doctors in last few months and for the doctors she had utmost disregard.
Since by virtue of practicing ethics and confidentiality of a patient's treatment details I would not elaborate the details on a public platform but to keep it short and sum it up only a complete treatment can give complete relief. In a treatment plan particularly for a chronic long standing problem a wholesome treatment involving multiple steps are involved. If one quits the treatment midway due to affordability issues then the problems will remain.
However I wish she gets relief . Goodluck to you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I made an appointment for 2.30 but after some time the junior doctor called me asking to come by 1.30 as Doctor will not be available after 2. Now 1st thing you said doctor will not be there after 2 then how come on practo you are taking appointment  even after 2.30. Secondly i reached the clinic at 1.40 but the doctor checked me at 4.20... is this a way to handle patients..... never referring anyone
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback.I attended you at 2.15 pm.Your appointment was preponed from 2.30 pm to to 2 pm.Your had to wait for 15 mins from your scheduled appointment time .However no apologies offered as during dental health procedures few minutes may have to be given to a patient if need be.Thanks once again.
